name: Date of the Tentacle
description:
"The interface and gameplay feel great. Well done." (Pedro Carvalho) "Loved it. That was hilarious! That ending..." (shdon) "Fun! Was so happy to return to the mansion ..."  (Tyler Maxwell) "I thought it was really good and funny!"  (Cmdr)

Green Tentacle moved out, because the Mansion is full of Maniacs. But he feels alone now. Help Bernard build a tentacle-girl for him ...
